title: Ancient Treatments - New Practices | PBS
description: A look at how traditional Chinese medical practices are being used today.
cleaned_text: Ancient Treatments - New Practices A look at how traditional Chinese medical practices are being used today. The roots of medicine go back many hundreds of years in China. While medical systems have adopted modern techniques, the old ways are still observed and studied in some Chinese medical schools.
